description: A list of budgets in a farm.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID associated with the budgets.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If Deadline Cloud returns nextToken, then there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, call the operation again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. If no results remain, then nextToken is set to null. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. If you provide a token that isn't valid, then you receive an HTTP 400 ValidationException error.

nested_items.name: budgets
nested_items.description: The budgets to include on the list.

nested_items.name: usageTrackingResource
nested_items.description: The resource used to track expenditure in the budget.
INACTIVE---The budget is inactive. This can include Expired, Canceled, or deleted Deleted statuses.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the budget summary to update.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the budget summary.

nested_items.name: approximateDollarLimit
nested_items.description: The approximate dollar limit of the budget.

nested_items.name: approximateDollarUsage
nested_items.description: The amount of the budget consumed.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that updated this resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was updated.
